div.p: A generic element used to encode a descriptive term in accordance with local descriptive rules.

A generic element used to encode a descriptive term in accordance with local descriptive rules. The local authority – thesaurus or local controlled vocabulary – should be declared in the localTypeDeclaration element within the control section.
function, legalStatus, localControl, localDescription, mandate, occupation, place

eac-cpf:function.eac-cpf:descriptiveNote: Social, political, and cultural role typical of landed aristocracy in England. The first Viscount Campden amassed a large fortune in trade in London and purchased extensive estates, including Exton (Rutland), and Chipping Campden (Gloucestershire). The Barham Court (Kent) estate was the acquisition of the first Baron Barham, a successful admiral and naval administrator (First Lord of the Admiralty 1805).

eac-cpf:legalStatus.eac-cpf:term: Organismo de la Administracion Central del Estado

eac-cpf:descriptiveNote.eac-cpf:p: Board created in 1919 to receive and examine applications for bonuses from Minnesota soldiers.
